snippet: Service on the Metro-North Railroad’s Hudson Line was suspended on Thursday night after a freight train derailed in the Bronx, the authorities said. No injuries were reported.
abstract: Freight train derails in the Bronx, suspending service on the Metro-North Railroad’s Hudson Line; no injuries are reported.
lead_paragraph: Service on the Metro-North Railroad’s Hudson Line was suspended on Thursday night after a freight train derailed in the Bronx, the authorities said. No injuries were reported.
